1096057202501144581.text: I’m a proud co-sponsor of H.R. 962, the Born Alive Abortion Survivors Protection Act. This would make it illegal to kill babies born alive after surviving an attempted abortion. Protecting the sanctity of life is something I will always fight for. https://t.co/ymjyH8hBtF
